# Code of Conduct

## Our Pledge

We are committed to providing a welcoming and inclusive environment for all contributors, regardless of background or experience level.

## Our Standards

Be respectful and professional. We expect all contributors to:

- Be kind and constructive in discussions
- Respect differing opinions and experiences
- Give and accept feedback gracefully
- Focus on what's best for the project and community

Unacceptable behavior includes:

- Harassment, discrimination, or hate speech
- Trolling or insulting comments
- Publishing private information without consent
- Any conduct that creates an unsafe or unwelcoming environment

## Enforcement

If someone violates this code of conduct, we reserve the right to remove contributions, block accounts, or take other appropriate action.

## Contact

For code of conduct violations, please contact the project maintainer.

---

Thank you for contributing respectfully!
